channel.title: Comments on: Creating a Basic Drilldown Report in SSRS 2005
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Chris Chreme
item.dc:creator: Chris Chreme
item.description: Thank you! By far the clearest example of how to do SSRS drilldown I've seen.
item.content:encoded: Thank you! By far the clearest example of how to do SSRS drilldown I’ve seen.

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: Probably by adding a subtotal on the grouping where you want the totals.
item.content:encoded: Probably by adding a subtotal on the grouping where you want the totals.

item.title: By: Theo Kouzelis
item.dc:creator: Theo Kouzelis
item.description: Awesome tutorial. Do you know how you would total the Product Cost column by any chance?
item.content:encoded: Awesome tutorial. Do you know how you would total the Product Cost column by any chance?
